bullets.text: Upcoming U.S. inflation report faces data-quality doubts, complicating Fed outlook and bond market pricing.
Netflix misses earnings amid Brazilian tax dispute; shares drop despite confidence in continued growth.
OpenAI launches ChatGPT Atlas browser, pressuring Google; Alphabet shares fall on competitive search threat.
Investors warn of AI bubble as valuations surge; LangChain hits $1.25B, Fal.ai reportedly $4B+, Sesame raises $250M.
Take Back Tesla campaign urges shareholders to reject Elon Musk’s proposed $1 trillion pay package.
GM stock jumps ~15% on earnings beat and raised guidance; separately, automaker abandons BrightDrop electric vans.
Capital One posts strong quarter, announces new buyback, easing credit risk concerns.
Asia stocks fall as Japan exports rebound overall but shipments to U.S. keep tumbling, highlighting weak U.S. demand.
Foreign hackers breached a U.S. nuclear weapons plant via SharePoint flaws, underscoring escalating critical-infrastructure cyber risk.
U.S. intensifies diplomacy to shore up Israel-Hamas cease-fire; JD Vance visits Israel as talks continue.
NASA chief signals SpaceX could be sidelined from Artemis moon mission after contract dispute intensifies.
Novo Nordisk’s oral GLP-1 candidate hits key milestone, advancing weight-loss market beyond injectables.
Scientists warn solar geoengineering ('dimming the sun') could trigger global chaos, complicating climate policy.
Researchers uncover hidden quantum effect in 2D materials, potentially enabling novel electronic or quantum devices.
